name: Monster Mash (itch) (bmandudeman)
description:
Monster Mash is a button mashing racing game made for the NES in 6502 Assembly.

It is my first game written for the NES.

To run the game you need an NES emulator.

The goal of the game is to mash the B button to go forwards towards the finish line. However the faster you mash the slower you go. 

INCLUDES .ASM SOURCE CODE
